name: Adventure Smasher
description:
In Adventure Smasher you get to play as the boss. It is your job to guard your treasure and kill all adventuring heroes that attempt to enter your lair in hopes of riches and glory.

You move around with WASD and aim with your mouse. You have three abilities; Normal attack (Left mouse click). Whirlwind (Right mouse click), and finally your ultimate ability (Space bar).

This is a highscore game where you try to survive as long as you can and kill as many adventurers as possible before you meet your demise. You Play as a Demon with cannon arms. Good luck!
